price: 76. Wuxuu Alle u kordhiyaa kuwa hanuunay hanuun. Camallada wanaagsan ee baaqiga ah baana khayr roon Rabbigaa agtiis oo leh aayo wanaagsan.
arabic: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ هُدٗىۗ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٞ مَّرَدًّا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayazīdu al-lahu alladhīna ih'tadaw hudan wal-bāqiyātu al-ṣāliḥātu khayrun ʿinda rabbika thawāban wakhayrun maraddan
